revised_title: The Probability of Excitation in Neon: A New Approach
tldr: This article explores the probability of excitation in neon through electron impact. The authors develop a new method to estimate the average probability of excitation, taking into account the effects of inelastic collisions and ionization. Their findings contribute to a better understanding of the distribution of energies in electron streams and the role of atomic properties in determining the probability of excitation.
